data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Makkah, Saudi Arabia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Makkah, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Makkah, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary: On average, 62 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Makkah, Saudi Arabia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Makkah access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 8,361 believers in Makkah and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Saudi - Hijazi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Saudi - Hijazi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Saudi - Hijazi people is yours.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Makkah that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Makkah, Saudi Arabia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Makkah.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Makkah
location.cities_list: Jeddah, Mecca, Ta’if, Ash Shafā, Turabah
